app.name: RapidRAW
app.one_liner: A beautiful, non-destructive, and GPU-accelerated RAW image editor built with performance in mind.

screens.name: Editor
screens.purpose: Primary workspace for viewing and editing RAW images with real-time previews.
primary_actions: Adjust exposure, contrast, and color grading
Apply creative effects like Glow, Halation, and Lens Flare
Use masking and local adjustment tools

rust_commands.name: save_item
rust_commands.purpose: Persist edited image metadata and sidecar files.

week 1: Implement basic image loading and display
week 1: Set up Tauri + React + Rust base project
